title: Linux dos2unix Command with Practical Examples
description: Learn how to use the dos2unix command to convert text files from DOS to Unix format. Explore practical examples and automate the conversion process with shell scripts.

meta.description: Learn how to use the dos2unix command to convert text files from DOS to Unix format. Explore practical examples and automate the conversion process with shell scripts.
meta.keywords: dos2unix, text file conversion, Unix, DOS, shell script, automation
